mapper.select: select c.id,c.name,c.category_img as imageUrl,c.default_selected as defaultSelected from category c order by c.third_name

select c.id,c.name,c.category_img as imageUrl,c.default_selected as defaultSelected ,c.second_name as secondName,c.third_name as thirdName from category c left join _brand_category b on c.id=b.category_id left join brand b1 on b1.id=b.brand_id where b1.name=#{brandName} order by c.third_name
